Improvements.Description: Java 14 introduced enhanced switch statements/expressions that can simplify your code. It allows multiple case labels to be specified for a switch case. This can be used to simplify the checking of multiple conditions for character 'c'.
The if-else ladder checking for different characters can be replaced with a switch-case for better readability.
